Package utility

Class IO

java.lang.Object
utility.IO
public final class IO
extends java.lang.Object
This class comprises static methods used for reading and writing files.
Since:
2.0
Version:
2.1
Author:
Simon Hackl

  • Method Details

    • readLinesFromFile

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readLinesFromFile​(java.lang.String filePath) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Reads a file and returns its content line-wise as list.
      Parameters:
      filePath - String representing a file path.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of String objects, each representing one line of the file accessed via the passed file path.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the specified file path does not lead to any file.

    • readGFF

      public static org.biojava.nbio.genome.parsers.gff.FeatureList readGFF​(java.io.File file) throws java.io.IOException
      Reads a .gff file from the path specified by a File object and returns a FeatureList object.
      Parameters:
      file - File specifying a .gff file.
      Returns:
      FeatureList comprising the entries from the read .gff file.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If the GFF3Reader throws any IOException.

    • readFastaToSet

      public static java.util.HashSet<FastaContainer> readFastaToSet​(java.io.File file) throws java.io.IOException
      Reads a .fasta file from a File object into a HashSet of FastaContainer instances. Each element contains the header and sequence of the respective entry from the .fasta file.
      Parameters:
      file - File specifying a .fasta file.
      Returns:
      HashSet of FastaContainer instances.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If the respective file can not be found or accessed.

    • readVariantsDictionary

      public static VariantsDictionary readVariantsDictionary​(java.io.File vDictFile) throws java.io.IOException
      Initializes a VariantsDictionary object from a variants dictionary JSON file.
      Parameters:
      vDictFile - File pointing to the JSON file to parse.
      Returns:
      VariantsDictionary instance.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If any error occurs while parsing the variants dictionary JSON file.

    • deleteDirectory

      public static void deleteDirectory​(java.io.File file) throws java.io.IOException
      Accepts a File object representing a directory that is subject to deletion.
      Parameters:
      file - File specifying the directory to delete.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If any file deletion procedure failed, for example the specified directory does not exist.

      MusialIOException - If the directory could not be generated.

    • copyFile

      public static void copyFile​(java.io.File file, java.io.File target) throws MusialIOException
      Copies the file pointed to with file to the file pointed to with target.
      Parameters:
      file - File object, the source file.
      target - File object, the target file.
      Throws:
      MusialIOException - If the copy procedure fails.

    • getSequencesFromPdbStructure

      public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getSequencesFromPdbStructure​(org.biojava.nbio.structure.Structure structure)
      Returns the chains sequences from a Structure instance parsed from a .pdb file.
      Parameters:
      structure - Structure instance to extract the chains sequences from.
      Returns:
      HashMap storing the .pdb files amino-acid sequences per chain.

    • readStructure

      public static org.biojava.nbio.structure.Structure readStructure​(java.io.File pdbFile) throws java.io.IOException
      Parses a Structure instance from a File pointing to a pdb file.
      Parameters:
      pdbFile - File instance pointing to a pdb file.
      Returns:
      Structure object parsed from specified pdb file.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If any error occurs while parsing the pdb file.

    • writeFasta

      public static void writeFasta​(java.io.File outputFile, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> sequences)
      Writes a fasta format file to the specified output file from a HashMap instance mapping sequences to lists of identifiers (used to construct the fasta entry headers).

      Each key of the passed map will be used to build one fasta entry. The header of the respective entry is constructed by joining all Strings of the value accessible via the (sequence) key with the `|` delimiter.

      Parameters:
      outputFile - File object pointing to the output fasta file.
      sequences - HashMap mapping sequences to ArrayList of strings.

    • writeVcf

      public static void writeVcf​(java.io.File outputFile, java.util.NavigableSet<java.lang.String> variants, java.lang.String chrom)
      Writes a dummy vcf format file to the specified output file from a NavigableSet instance yielding Strings that represent variants.

      - Each String in the passed NavigableSet has to be formatted as p@r@a, where p is the position, r the reference nucleotide content and a the only alternate form content. - All variants will be assigned a quality of 1000.

      Parameters:
      outputFile - File object pointing to the output vcf file.
      variants - NavigableSet containing variantInformation information, cf. method description.
      chrom - String representing the value to use for the chromosome field of the vcf format for each variantInformation.
